column4: BRIEF-Griffon Receives Antitrust Clearance For CornellCookson Acquisition

column4: BRIEF-Griffon Corporation Announces Clopay Building Products To Acquire Cornellcookson
column6: * GRIFFON CORPORATION ANNOUNCES CLOPAY BUILDING PRODUCTS TO ACQUIRE CORNELLCOOKSON
column7: * ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE FINANCED THROUGH CASH ON HAND
column8: * AFTER TAKING INTO ACCOUNT TAX BENEFITS RESULTING FROM TRANSACTION, EFFECTIVE PURCHASE PRICE IS APPROXIMATELY $170 MILLION
column9: * IN FIRST FULL YEAR OF OPERATIONS, GRIFFON EXPECTS CORNELLCOOKSON TO CONTRIBUTE $200 MILLION IN NET SALES AND $0.15 IN EARNINGS PER SHARE
column10: * CO, CORNELLCOOKSON HAVE STRUCTURED ACQUISITION SUCH THAT IT WILL BE TREATED AS AN ASSET PURCHASE FOR TAX PURPOSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
